name: 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2nd floor with elevator
description:
The apartment is 3-bedroom apartment with 2-bathrooms on the 2nd floor.
1st bedroom - double bed with air-condition.
2nd bedroom - 2 single beds with air-condition
3rd bedroom - 2 single beds with air-condition
Living room - 2 double sofa beds with air-condition

Fast free internet up to 100mbps
Central heating in winter on all day at around 21 c

Great transportation system. Direct metro connection to the airport and the port. Syntagma square 4 metro stations
neighborhood_overview:
Ampelokipi district is nice multinational and safe area with excellent transportation system. Staying in Ampelokipi area you have the safety you need when you are in a foreign country. Everything you need for your vacations you can find it next to the apartment: Shops, Supermarkets, Restaurants, Bars, Coffee shops, Bakeries, Groceries, 24 hours kiosk, Pharmacies, Hair Salon, Banks, Travel Agents, Cinemas, summer cinemas and many more...
Also every Saturday there is a Farmers market 2-3 minutes away from the apartment.

Athens Classical Marathon route pass from the area.
In the area you will also find Athens Concert Hall (Megaron Mousikis), National Sculpture Gallery, Badminton Theater (international shows), the biggest urban park in Athens, ministries, universities, embassies, hospitals and moreâ¦
host_about: Athens Quality Apartments is a company started back at 2007 and now we have 8 apartments. Our goal is to offer to travelers beautiful apartments with professional service only in good location and with all the necessary amenities.

name: Monastiraki flea market & metro station apartment
description: This cycladic style appartment , renovated in 2018, and located in the very heart of center of Athens. The apt is in an industrial style building ,in the midlle of Monastiraki flea market. 250 mts from Monastiraki Metro Station,150 mts from the colorfull and virbrant neighborhood of Psiri full of bars,and restaurants.7 min walking from the rock of Akropolis and 450 mts from famous Plaka,15min from Akropolis museum,Parhenon, and all the major attractions of ancient Athens.
neighborhood_overview: An excellent choice for a traveller who want to live and feel to the most the vibes of Athens because of its unique location. You can explore contemporary Athens and feel the atmosphere of the past at the same time.The apartment is in Athinas street in the heart of Monastiraki flea market ,encircled from bars ,restaurants,banks, super markets, ,commercial shops and many others. When you get out of the building it is full of people and market voices but the apartment is totaly quiet because it's at the back side of the building. For a traveller who is fan of this will be impressed.Athens 100 years back with modern comodities is the feeling.
host_about: Hello! We are Emmanuil & Stella, a fun-loving couple that leaves and work in Athens. We like to travel, meet new people and cultures, and we'll be happy to have you as our guests. You can become a part of the ancient and beautiful Athens and enjoy its sights. You are always welcome to stay in our fully equipped and cozy accommodations, which are on a walking distance from Athens landmarks.

name: Syntagma-Ermou 2BDR (Acropolis-Plaka 10Îon foot)
description:
Newly renovated 100Square meters flat, 4Îon foot from Syntagma metro station, next to Ermou pedestrian street (Voulis street and Ermou corner) in one of the best and safest districts of the Historical center of Athens (Syntagma). Everything Acropolis-Plaka-Monastiraki-Psiri is in walking distance of 10 minutes. Great base to visit all monuments on foot. Ideal for families and group of friends. Doorman available at the building.
Don't hesitate to ask any questions i will answer immediately.
neighborhood_overview:
Ermou street, next to the flat, is the most commercial -pedestrian only- shopping street in Athens. It is a 1,5 Km road connecting Kerameikos archaeological site with the Syntagma Square through Monastiraki, Plaka, Psiri and Thiseio. The neighborhood is full of shops, cafes, bars, restaurants, street food, mini markets, banks etc. You will live actually in the heart of Athens in one of the safest districts next to all the sights you wish to visit.
Syntagma metro station (4 minutes on foot from the house) is directly connected to Venizelos airport and the trip lasts 40 minutes. As soon as you get in the train at airport in 50 minutes max you will be in the house!!!!
host_about:
Hi, 
First of all thank you for checking on my listing, hope you choose it for your holidays. I will do the best from my side to have a great stay. Being an Airbnb host has become my latest passion. I have met so many interesting people and cultures the last years as a host. I love watching my new born daughter grow up. My favorite habits are cycling through the city, hiking and strolling downtown. I have done my best to provide you a clean and safe environment for your stay. If you have any questions donât hesitate to ask I will answer asap.
The motos i try to follow in my life are 
âBe the change that you wish to see in the world.â and 
âNo one has ever become poor by giving.â

description: The apt is located in vibrant Koukaki (attached to Acropolis area and to the most major ancient attractions),full of restaurants,bars,cafe,banks,S/M and all public tranportation. It is the ground floor of a 3 apts small building, has 2 bedrooms, living room, kitchen and bathroom. Only 800 mts from the Acropolis rock and museum and 450 mts from Singrou fix metro st. A short walking from Parthenon,Odeon of Herodes Atticus,ancient market,Theision, Monastiraki, Syntagma square,Philopapou hill,Plaka.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is very bright and functional, totally renovated in 2019, made to give you a lot of privecy and comfort.You can relax there and reload your batteries as it is located in a quiet of 3 apartments building in an also quiet street, in the heart of the vibrant Koukaki neighborhood full of nightlife and only 800 meters away from the touristic area, Areopagitou Str. Akropolis museum and the famous Plaka area. You don't even need to use any transportation, everything is around you, on your feet. There are also coffee shops,restaurants, commercial shops, banks, tourists info offices and whatever you need is there for you.

name: Codex Domus | Penthouse Pool Apartment | Athens
description: Codex Domus is a property of sunlight and design, standing over an area where small hills and narrow streets create an urban maze, waiting to be explored. A spacious interior *ideal for 2 couples or a family* complemented by a large balcony -that includes a small pool- can be your starting point for a proper Athenian escapade.
neighborhood_overview:
It is located in Gyzi, a picturesque part of the city. The area was named around the mid-1920s after Nikolaos Gyzis, a famous Greek painter who used to have his studio here back in the 1860s. A lot may have changed since then, however, the amalgamation of both its architecture and people is what makes Gyzi a neighborhood with a character.

Right next within 5' walk from the apartment, there is Pedion Areos, one of the largest public parks in Athens where you can go jogging or have a walk along with your friend or family.
